attributes.action: Yorkshire Water to Reduce the cost to single households
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the Government to force Yorkshire Water into issuing a single person discount on the Water rates. Currently you have a 1 person household paying exactly the same as a house with 4/5 people in it.
This is grossly unfair as a lot of people who live alone are elderly and the Water rates are the only utility that no one regardless of circumstance receives any form of benefit.
